You will be responsible to understand business and client requirements, analyze and document the same to provide actionable insights to the engineering team.   You will be working closely with product owners and business stakeholders to convert business use cases into software requirements specification documents.   If you have the potential and want to be part of our dynamic team, send in your applications to us right away.    Responsibilities        Understand, Analyze and Document business requirements of customers, making recommendations for improvements   Oversee the implementation of software development projects from inception to completion   Interact with Project Managers, Technical Architect and the Engineering team to ensure that business requirements are fulfilled in the systems we build.
